languages.text: {n}Несколько долгих минут вы ходите вокруг паразита, стараясь как можно аккуратнее отсоединить вросшие щупальца. В какой-то момент носитель вздрагивает и начинает яростно сопротивляться, а ваша рука соскальзывает... Паразит отцепляется от тела мужчины, однако оба падают замертво.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Несколько долгих минут вы ходите вокруг паразита, стараясь как можно аккуратнее отсоединить вросшие щупальца. В какой-то момент носитель вздрагивает и начинает яростно сопротивляться, а ваша рука соскальзывает... Паразит отцепляется от тела мужчины, однако оба падают замертво.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Несколько долгих минут вы ходите вокруг паразита, стараясь как можно аккуратнее отсоединить вросшие щупальца. В какой-то момент носитель вздрагивает и начинает яростно сопротивляться, а ваша рука соскальзывает... Паразит отцепляется от тела мужчины, однако оба падают замертво.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You circle he parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the ingrown tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite lets go of the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

{n}You circle he parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the ingrown tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite lets go of the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

{n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

{n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

{n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你围着寄生生物转了几圈，试图将死死缠住的触须分开。你尽可能小心翼翼地操作，但操作了一会儿，宿主突然开始抽搐，身体剧烈挣扎起来。你的手滑了一下……寄生生物松开了男人的身体，两只生物都倒在了地上，死了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你围着寄生生物转了几圈，试图将死死缠住的触须分开。你尽可能小心翼翼地操作，但操作了一会儿，宿主突然开始抽搐，身体剧烈挣扎起来。你的手滑了一下……寄生生物松开了男人的身体，两只生物都倒在了地上，死了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das vueltas al parásito durante varios minutos intentando separar los zarcillos arraigados. Aunque intentas tener cuidado, en un momento dado el hombre empieza a moverse y forcejear violentamente. Tu mano resbala... el parásito suelta el cuerpo del hombre, pero ambos han muerto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das vueltas al parásito durante varios minutos intentando separar los zarcillos arraigados. Aunque intentas tener cuidado, en un momento dado el hombre empieza a moverse y forcejear violentamente. Tu mano resbala... el parásito suelta el cuerpo del hombre, pero ambos han muerto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}じっくりと寄生体の周りをぐるりと回り、巻きついた触手を切り離そうと試みる。注意して実行に移そうとするものの、どこかのタイミングで宿主がけいれんを起こし、激しく体を揺らし始めた。指が滑る…寄生体は男の体から離れたが、どちらも倒れて動かなくなった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}じっくりと寄生体の周りをぐるりと回り、巻きついた触手を切り離そうと試みる。注意して実行に移そうとするものの、どこかのタイミングで宿主がけいれんを起こし、激しく体を揺らし始めた。指が滑る…寄生体は男の体から離れたが、どちらも倒れて動かなくなった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du umkreist den Parasiten einige lange Minuten und versuchst, die verwurzelten Ranken zu lösen. Du bist möglichst vorsichtig, aber irgendwann zuckt der Wirt und fängt an, unkontrolliert um sich zu schlagen. Deine Hand rutscht ab ... Der Parasit gibt den Körper des Mannes frei, aber beide stürzen tot zu Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du umkreist den Parasiten einige lange Minuten und versuchst, die verwurzelten Ranken zu lösen. Du bist möglichst vorsichtig, aber irgendwann zuckt der Wirt und fängt an, unkontrolliert um sich zu schlagen. Deine Hand rutscht ab ... Der Parasit gibt den Körper des Mannes frei, aber beide stürzen tot zu Boden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pendant de longues minutes, vous faites le tour du parasite tout en vous efforçant de détacher les tentacules enserrant sa victime. Malgré toutes vos précautions, cette dernière finit par tressaillir et se met à se débattre furieusement. Votre main dérape... et les appendices relâchent leur étreinte, après quoi le parasite et l'homme tombent tous les deux raides morts.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pendant de longues minutes, vous faites le tour du parasite tout en vous efforçant de détacher les tentacules enserrant sa victime. Malgré toutes vos précautions, cette dernière finit par tressaillir et se met à se débattre furieusement. Votre main dérape... et les appendices relâchent leur étreinte, après quoi le parasite et l'homme tombent tous les deux raides morts.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parazitle birkaç dakika boyunca uğraşıp derinlere sapladığı filizlerini ayırmaya çalışıyorsun. Dikkatli olmaya çalışsan da konak titremeye ve şiddetle sarsılmaya başlıyor. Elin kayıyor... Parazit, adamın bedeninden ayrılıyor ama ikisi de cansız şekilde yere yığılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You circle the parasite for a few long minutes, trying to detach the rooted tendrils. You are trying to be careful, but at some point the host twitches and starts struggling violently. Your hand slips... The parasite releases the man's body, but both fall over dead.{/n}
